briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Fluoxetine in Juvenile Fibromyalgia
officialTitle: An Open-Label Clinical Trial of Fluoxetine Treatment of Juvenile Primary Fibromyalgia Syndrome
summary: The purpose of this research is to conduct an open, pilot trial to assess the efficacy and safety of fluoxetine in the treatment of Juvenile Primary Fibromyalgia Syndrome (JPFS).

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Daily on average in the past week.
